message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested but I'd need to see a price closer to $100 to make it work for me.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  How about $105? I'm really interested in this product and we're getting close.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll do $107.50
